text: عَسَىٰ رَبُّكُمْ أَن يَرْحَمَكُمْ ۚ وَإِنْ عُدتُّمْ عُدْنَا ۘ وَجَعَلْنَا جَهَنَّمَ لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ حَصِيرًا

translation.en.sahih: [Then Allah said], "It is expected, [if you repent], that your Lord will have mercy upon you. But if you return [to sin], We will return [to punishment]. And We have made Hell, for the disbelievers, a prison-bed."
translation.id.indonesian: Mudah-mudahan Tuhanmu akan melimpahkan rahmat(Nya) kepadamu; dan sekiranya kamu kembali kepada (kedurhakaan) niscaya Kami kembali (mengazabmu) dan Kami jadikan neraka Jahannam penjara bagi orang-orang yang tidak beriman.
